name: Ghost Evolution | Tap Soul of the Creepy Mutant Clicker Game in Graveyard
name_original: Ghost Evolution | Tap Soul of the Creepy Mutant Clicker Game in Graveyard
description:
Little ghost was born from spirit of rancor in the horrible graveyard with the ability to develop itself from eating the spirit of another ghost in order to survive the ghost hunters.
At the graveyard located in abandoned valley. It was an execution place for the prisoners . This made this place full of horrible spirit . Some spirits were very strong wrath to revenge which made some transformed into a ghost or a monster. If some had the more spirit, it become more powerful such as the skeleton, zombie , witch , werewolf or vampires . Some spirits were born with a little spirit. It made them tried to find the way to keep up their strength by eating ghost spirit from the other as our protagonist . it could develop itself which made its stronger to survive because in this island was full of ghosts , so it caught the ghost hunters attention.
